Enabling Founders

VentureBuilders is a hands-on European venture capital fund, focused on AI, data and general SaaS companies

  • Network

    We provide our ventures with access to network, including world-class experts at top institutions, potential customers and follow-up investors

  • Capital

    We invest during seed-stage and continue to fund the best ventures through additional rounds. We help secure investment from later-stage investors where possible

  • Specialists

    We have a team of specialists in marketing, UX, design, finance and HR to support ventures in areas where an in-house hire doesn’t make sense
